With all the citizens of Israel, with all the Jewish people, and many of the world, I bow my head in memory of our beloved, darling of the nation, the late Shimon Peres.
Simon dedicated his life to Independence with us. As a visionary, he looked to the future. A security guard, fortified the strength of Israel in many ways, even today some still unknown
A man of peace, a follow up to the last days of reconciliation with our neighbors and a better future for our children. Seven years in which he served as president, has done much to unite the people
And the people answered him great love. No many people in our history who have contributed so much to the State of Israel and the people of Israel.
I would like to add something from a personal viewpoint. Simon first met 40 years ago on the brink of the grave of my brother Yoni.
I will never forget his warm towards me, my brother Iddo, and to the parents of blessed memory, moments of our grief.

Unfortunately deep, this prayer was not answered. Now Simon, the darling of the nation, separate from us. But is not separate, it will never be separated, our hearts and our memory.

Shimon Peres's name will be immortalized in the book of revival of the Jewish people as one of the greatest leaders established the State of Israel, and one of the Habot Hmiisdim who established Israel

Today, we launched an integrated government strategy to explore the future of vital sectors in the country. The goal is to anticipate challenges and seize opportunities. Https://t.co/sSnTR5qZlc
The strategy includes building future models for the health, education, social, developmental and environmental sectors and building national capacities in the field of looking ahead
The strategy includes the development of government systems to make the outlook for the future part of the government's strategic planning and expand it to three stages in the future
A specialized college for future studies, specialized missions for the future, government laboratories, international partnerships and specialized ministerial task forces will be established
Israel has lost a brave leader and Europe a dear friend. My deepest condolences to the family of Shimon Peres and the people of Israel

We are a state that is fond of the future. This is one of the most important secrets of our success. Our government is the government of the future. God willing, the industry of the future will be a key part of the work of our government.
